description: This file defines a Redux slice for managing shopping cart state, including actions and reducers for adding, removing, and clearing items.

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: Adds an item to the cart or increases quantity if it already exists.

methods.name: removeItem
methods.description: Removes one quantity of an item from the cart or filters out items with zero quantity.

methods.name: clearCart
methods.description: Clears all items from the cart.
